https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/f2FN3nEqtRk7TDqgRDJzdKOBpFp.jpg Dzaomalaza goes in search of a unique sapphire in Southern Madagascar in order to enrich himself. But three women are in his path: Evah wants to hand over the sapphire, Masy wants wealth and power and Revol wants to improve the fate of the entire community. Dzaomalaza and the Blue Sapphire
